name: BULL Token
description: We've structured our tokenomics with a few things in mind. Our pre-sale gives the project the funds it needs for a healthy launch without favoring pre-sale buyers so much that it undermines a healthy public launch. Team allocation is very small and is intended to ensure we have the firepower we need for a smooth delivery. Plenty of tokens have been allocated for community rewards, CEX/DEX liquidity, and ongoing marketing.
